int do_amend_current_rule(int num)

Returns:

do_amend_motion
int do_amend_motion(int num)
This method allows the person to amend a new rule. Amendments are only allowed by magistrates and only during the discusion phase.

Parameters:
num - the id of the rule to comment on
Returns:
1 on success, 0 on failure
do_comment_on
int do_comment_on(int num)
This method allows the person to make a comment on a current rule. Comments are only allowed by magistrates and only in the first two phases.

Parameters:
num - the id of the rule to comment on
Returns:
1 on success, 0 on failure
